events.message: The customer reported that their car was involved in a collision at an intersection, causing significant front-end damage.
The insurance claim was categorized under Auto Accident after initial review of the reported keywords and damage.
An agent was assigned to handle the car accident claim to ensure proper assistance and timely processing.
The customer was informed that their claim has been acknowledged and the process to handle the case has begun.
Request made for pictures of the damaged vehicle, police report, and witness statements to proceed with assessment.
Customer submitted all required documents including photos of the vehicle and the official accident report.
The claims investigation team initiated inquiry into the circumstances of the vehicle collision as per submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the claim validity based on documentation and corroborating witness statements.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer to cover the repair costs of the damaged vehicle.
The customer expressed appreciation for the clear communication and the timely offer proposed by the insurance company.
After settlement agreement, the claim was officially approved enabling the next step of payment processing.
Payment covering the repair costs was transferred to the customer's account as per the agreed settlement.
The car accident claim was successfully closed after payment was issued and all formalities were completed.
All documents and correspondences related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
